data.text: An absolute scam!! The room was not at all as described. I stayed in the private twin room and on the advert it states that it comes with a desk, seating area, fan and wardrobe. It had none of these except for the fan which did not work. The room just had 2 bunk beds and that was it! I had a private bathroom which was located outside my room which smelled like someone had been boiling cabbage, but that was the least of my worries. The door had a self locking system with keycard access and when closing that door from the outside, the handle would fall off, making it near impossible to close it. This would happen every time! Also, the restaurant does not serve half of what is on the menu. They claim to serve various meals, but in reality only serve pizza and sandwiches. When I raised these issues with the front desk, the guy working there just chuckled about it and with regards to the fan, told me that I wouldn’t need it as it doesn’t get that hot at night in Barcelona, which is beside the point; and with regards to the menu, he told me that because it is a hostel, it is not their responsibility to provide food for the guests. I’m sorry, but isn’t that the purpose of having a restaurant on site??? The biggest joke of them all? Quiet time - this is supposed to be between 0:00 and 7:00. Does anybody follow it? Do they heck! If anything, people are louder at that time. I could hear people partying, shouting, revving car and motorbike engines until well into the early hours of the morning, with nothing being done to stop them. And despite having a designated front desk, the reception is constantly moved to the restaurant, which is a real inconvenience to anyone who had to climb up the huge mountain to get to the property as you then have to walk further (not fun if you have heavy bags!). Also, the front desk being left unattended is a cause for concern as they have a till float behind there and it could get robbed. This company pride themselves in employing people with disabilities which is a good gesture, but they seem to also take advantage of them as I saw the same members of staff working long hours each day I was there. This property also does not respond to messages either as I complained to them after my stay to complain and they didn’t even respond! I am currently having to get in touch with Trading Standards in Spain to try to resolve this issue. This place definitely needs to be inspected and shut down ASAP!!!!
data.title: The Biggest Scam in Barcelona!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi Lukasz:

Thank yoy for your stay. As indicated in the description the private twin room has 2 bunk beds. 
We have 24 hours recepction and a maintenance team that could have fixed your handle problem if you had told us at the front desk.
In the restaurant, in addition to pizzas and sandwiches, we serve: breakfast, lunch and dinner. It is a simple menu but we offer it daily, at the corresponding times.
The quiet time it´s from 00:00 to 7:00, which we rigorously respect by our clients and our neighbors, who value the tranquility of the Natural Park. Again we have reception 24 hours in case there is any issue.
90% of our staff have some type of disability. The team works 8 hours a day, 40 hours a week with two consecutive days of weekly rest. At Inout Hostel there is no overtime work.

Thank you for your stay and for your comment, it helps us improve.
owner_response.author: Inout Hostel

data.text: It was ok. We knowed that is hostel. For us was enough. Room, towels, linen was clean. Eating was good. Staff was nice and very helpful. Swimming pool and field to soccer and basketball was super for my children and us. Was also boars but not agresive. For us on the downside were night parties on the terrace. We were unlucky because the metro was closed for half of our stay and it took us an hour to get to the center of Barcelona. The next week it was only 20 minutes. The road to the hostel is uphill, it is difficult especially with heavy luggage. We will remember our stay at InOut well.
data.title: Enough for us

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for your kind review. We are very glad you enjoyed all the facilites and you were in touch with nature,. Please bear in mind that reception is open 24hors in case you need assistance with noise or any issue.
owner_response.author: Inout Hostel

data.text: Is a good place , suitable for back bag travelers , just care for your stuff , sleep and leave , and good also because is beside hiking attractions , stuff is good , calm , clean , silent , fresh air and good team work ,, you will find a collaboration with new experience
data.title: Barcelona , suitable sleep

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you for your kind review, Mostafa. We are very happy to know that you had a good stay at INOUT.
owner_response.author: Inout Hostel

data.text: Nice views and room, everythins is very clean. The city centre is very close, so easy to reach. The staff was super friendly and took great care of the needs of the group. The food was very good and the rooms were spacious, with plenty of natural light and clean. The whole group left happy, we recommend it.
data.title: Perfect for youngsters groups and activities in the nature

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
We are glad to now that you enjoyed your stay at Inout. Our team of disable people are always,making the best effort to guarantee a nice and comfortable stay at INOUT.
Out hostel is prepared to receive groups with a previous booking.
owner_response.author: Inout Hostel

data.text: They 'double booked' our room and put us in bunk beds in a crowded room with ~20 people instead of the private room we payed for. After paying more specifically so we didn't have to stay in a room with strangers. No refund either. Definitely the kind of place to avoid.
data.title: They 'double booked' our room and made us sleep in a crowded room
